item.title: Rstudio Conf 2019: Education and Organizations
item.description: Well, RStudio Conf 2019 has come and gone. I attended the main conference, starting with the poster session on wednesday and stayed through the tidyverse developer day on Saturday. To say that the conference was inspiring was an understatement. So many talented people working on such interesting and inspiring packages! It made me excited again about doing data science and teaching data science. This post is going to highlight the interesting talks about education and organizational management at the conference.
